title: unesco_heritage_Longmen_Grottoes
text:
Name: Longmen Grottoes. short_description:

The grottoes and niches of Longmen contain the largest and most impressive collection of Chinese art of the late Northern Wei and Tang Dynasties (316-907). These works, entirely devoted to the Buddhist religion, represent the high point of Chinese stone carving.

. date_inscribed: 2000. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 112.4666667. latitude: 34.46666667. area_hectares: 331. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: China. Region: Asia and the Pacific. iso_code: cn. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
